metadata.title: Digital Twin: Benefits, use cases, challenges, and opportunities

summary.problem_statement: Applications of Digital Twin technology are growing exponentially, transforming business operations across industries.
summary.objective: To conduct a literature review exploring how Digital Twins streamline intelligent automation in different industries.
summary.key_contribution: Comprehensive analysis of Digital Twin definitions, enabling technologies, industry applications, and challenges/opportunities.

methodology.method_summary: Conducted narrative literature review using Scopus and Google Scholar databases, analyzing peer-reviewed articles, conference papers, and reports to address research questions on Digital Twin definitions, technologies, applications, and challenges.

key_findings: Digital Twin market is projected to grow at 25% CAGR from 2023-2032, reaching $73.5 billion by 2027
Technology adoption spans manufacturing, healthcare, agriculture, construction, and automotive industries with applications in predictive maintenance, product design, and supply chain optimization
evaluation_metrics: Industry adoption percentages (75% IoT organizations using Digital Twins by 2020)
